title: Redesign Dashboard to Match Reference Application

requirements.text: Transform the CommandCenter page to match the layout and visual style of the reference application at https://ai.studio/apps/a97f3825-5282-4ea0-bd66-c18737521df6, including grid structure, card arrangements, and spacing
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard layout matches the reference application's grid structure
Card components are arranged in the same visual hierarchy as the reference
Spacing and proportions align with the reference design

requirements.text: Update color scheme and visual theming to match the reference application's aesthetic, including card backgrounds, text colors, accent colors, and overall color palette
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme matches the reference application
Card styling and backgrounds align with reference design
Text hierarchy and typography match the reference

requirements.text: Redesign or replace existing dashboard cards (KPIMetricsRow, NeuralIngestInput, SynopsisEngineCard, SpectralAnalysisCard) to match the content structure and visual presentation of equivalent cards in the reference application
acceptanceCriteria: Each card component's content and layout matches its counterpart in the reference
Card interactions and animations align with reference behavior
Data visualization components match the reference style

requirements.text: Update the DashboardLayout sidebar navigation to match the reference application's navigation structure, including menu items, icons, and visual styling
acceptanceCriteria: Sidebar navigation structure matches the reference
Navigation icons and labels align with reference design
Active state styling matches the reference application

requirements.text: Adjust responsive behavior and mobile layout to match how the reference application handles different screen sizes and breakpoints
acceptanceCriteria: Responsive breakpoints match the reference application
Mobile layout and stacking order align with reference
Touch interactions work consistently with reference

constraints: Preserve existing backend functionality and API contracts
Keep all existing hooks and context providers functional
Do not modify immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Adding new backend features or data models
Modifying subscription tier logic or feature gating
Adding new third-party dependencies beyond what's needed for UI matching
